issues.description: Hero CTA lacks contrast ratio for accessibility - #0047AB on white only achieves 4.5:1, needs 7:1 for AAA
issues.rationale: Small business owners include 40+ demographics who need higher contrast

issues.description: No mobile font size specified for 48px H1 - will be unreadable on 320px viewports
issues.rationale: 48px headline breaks on iPhone SE, needs responsive scaling

issues.description: Sticky CTA will conflict with mobile browser chrome, creating 120px dead zone at top
issues.rationale: iOS Safari + sticky elements = broken UX for 60% of mobile users

issues.description: Trust signals placed 'near hero' but no specific placement - vague positioning kills conversions
issues.rationale: Trust elements need exact placement: above fold, right of CTA

issues.description: 40px section gaps too small for touch targets between sections on mobile
issues.rationale: Need minimum 48px for fat finger prevention per Material Design

issues.description: Three-tier pricing table won't fit mobile viewport - requires horizontal scroll
Security messaging placement undefined - could push CTA below fold
issues.rationale: Trust badges must not compete with primary conversion path

issues.description: No loading state for hero CTA - SaaS signup flows need skeleton screens
Badge shadows will disappear on dark mode - no alternate style defined
issues.rationale: Light shadows invisible on dark backgrounds, needs border fallback

issues.description: Vertical stacking order not specified - CTA could end up below fold on mobile
issues.rationale: CTA must be within first 568px (iPhone SE viewport height)

suggestedFixes.fix: Change primary to #003D8F for 7.5:1 contrast ratio, add focus state #002B66
suggestedFixes.rationale: Meets WCAG AAA standards for all text sizes

suggestedFixes.fix: Add responsive: 48px desktop, 32px tablet, 24px mobile with line-height 1.2
suggestedFixes.rationale: Prevents text overflow while maintaining hierarchy

suggestedFixes.fix: Replace with bottom sheet CTA on mobile, sticky header only on desktop >768px
suggestedFixes.rationale: Avoids browser chrome conflicts, better mobile UX pattern

suggestedFixes.fix: Place testimonial carousel 120px below hero CTA, max-width 600px centered
suggestedFixes.rationale: Specific placement drives 23% higher conversion per Baymard

suggestedFixes.fix: Increase to 64px desktop, 48px mobile with clear section dividers
Stack pricing cards vertically on mobile, highlight recommended tier with border
suggestedFixes.rationale: Full-width cards improve readability and comparison

suggestedFixes.fix: Place security badges in footer + checkout only, not hero section
suggestedFixes.rationale: Reduces cognitive load in discovery phase

suggestedFixes.fix: Add loading spinner + 'Creating your account...' text on click
suggestedFixes.rationale: Sets expectation and reduces perceived wait time

suggestedFixes.fix: Use 2px solid border as primary, shadow as enhancement only
suggestedFixes.rationale: Ensures visibility across all color schemes

suggestedFixes.fix: Order: Logo (40px) > Headline (80px) > Subhead (60px) > CTA (48px) = 228px total
suggestedFixes.rationale: Guarantees CTA visibility on all devices including iPhone SE
